game.name: Summer Trip Cruise
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 안녕, 너, 우리에게 선장이 필요해! 화면에 표시된 조타 장치로 마우스를 사용하여 크루즈 선박을 조향하고, 장애물을 피하며 사진을 찍고 여행을 즐겨봐. 편안히 즐겨... 아니면 도전해봐!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hey you, we need a captain! Use your mouse to drive the cruise ship with the on-screen rudder, avoid obstacles, take pictures and enjoy the ride. Take it easy... or take the challenge!
